name: The Crumblord Starter Pack
description:
Crumblord, the classic 1998 series is back! the first 5 games, known as, "The Government Saga" are finally all together, and ready to play!

Including such classics as : 

Crumblord takes down the government : Crumblord, a little man with horns, tries to pirate some software. however, the government has other plans. (created by frostix)

Crumblord in the forest of flimbo : Crumblord has lost his trusty griddler, and must travel into the forest of flimbo (created by leafora)

Crumblord in the burgundy zucchini whatever : i don't know what this one is about (created by Dj Sneakman)

Crumblords exodus from hell : Dead, killed, and hellified, crumblord must escape the confines of hell by completing 9 trails (created by TheMutantSpaceDancer)

Crumblord House Troubles : The final game in the crumblord "government" saga. (created by Phobophobia, with assets from everyone)

CrumblordCollection1.zip includes games 1-3, while the 2nd file includes the final 2 games

Cover By ToadDan
https://twitter.com/ToadDan_

CRUMBLORD IS THE COOLEST AROUND!!! YEAH!!! YEAAAAAAH!!! CRUMBLORDD!!!
